title: suzan811
author: suzan811
content: I will use bitcoin to pay you the theme price plus your fee. You must have access to any of the payment options listed below: PayPal, Skrill, Visa, Mastercard, American Express.  I'll give you the login information for my Envato account. You must sign in and pay.  Many thanks

comments.author: Eternad
comments.body: Quote from: suzan811 on September 02, 2023, 02:25:05 PM I will use bitcoin to pay you the theme price plus your fee. You must have access to any of the payment options listed below: PayPal, Skrill, Visa, Mastercard, American Express.  I'll give you the login information for my Envato account. You must sign in and pay.  Many thanks I can do this using my paypal account but I don’t know how much fee I will charge so just give me an offer through PM.Also, I just want to let you know that I will remove my paypal account on the payment option the moment I successfully purchased you the premium account to avoid being automatically deducted of the monthly subscription. Shoot me a PM so that we can arrange everything. I will not go first on this deal so which means that you will pay me first for the premium cost plus the fee(whatever you feel comfortable) before I will process the premium.

comments.author: rat03gopoh
comments.body: Quote from: suzan811 on September 02, 2023, 02:25:05 PMI'll give you the login information for my Envato account.Is this necessary?I've made purchases for other people, and you shouldn't have to give other people access to your account. Purchases can be made through anyone's account or (as I recall) you just need to send a link to the invoice.Quote from: Eternad on September 02, 2023, 02:29:14 PMAlso, I just want to let you know that I will remove my paypal account on the payment option the moment I successfully purchased you the premium account to avoid being automatically deducted of the monthly subscription. OP only wants item purchases, not subscriptions.

comments.author: Stalker22
comments.body: Quote from: Eternad on September 02, 2023, 02:29:14 PMAlso, I just want to let you know that I will remove my paypal account on the payment option the moment I successfully purchased you the premium account to avoid being automatically deducted of the monthly subscription. Shoot me a PM so that we can arrange everything. I hope you will be careful and that you know all the repercussions of such an action. In my opinion, it is better to use your envato account to buy the item than to put your PayPal information into someone else's account and having them manage the transaction on your behalf.
